page.title: 16A Distict Nurse, Cotteridge
page.content: My Mom, Kate Barton, is a{State Enrolled Nurse.}She trained at Selly Oak Hospital for 2 years. Following another 6 months training she qualified as a{district nurse.}My Mom started nursing in October 1969, because she wanted to help people and she thought nursing would be a{worthwhile career}. My Mom thinks it is enjoyable when she sees patients she has nursed, get better. However, sometimes she cannot nurse people in the community because of the lack of equipment. At the moment my Mom does not work in a hospital ward she goes round to the peoples' houses. My Mom also works at a{Health Centre} where she does dressings, injections, and takes stitches out. Her patients vary from babies to people over 90. She works a 5 day week with alternate weekends and every Wednesday off.
